Percentage breakdown of attempted calls for the surveys conducted
on the listenership of the radio facilities at Ohio University 1955-1957*

The interviewers experienced a lack of ability on the part of some of
the respondents to estimate the number of hours per week they listened to
1*011, and a lack of knowledge of whether they listened on Ail or FM.
